title: Article 3 - Residential Care Facilities
content:
Article 3 - Residential Care Facilities

State Regulations

Part 410 - Scheduled Short-term Care In A Nursing Home (§ 410.1 to 410.3)

Part 411 - Ombudsmen Access To Residential Health Care Facilities (§ 411.1)

Part 412 - Reporting Information For Inspections (§ 412.1 to 412.3)

Part 413 - Consumer Information System (§ 413.1 to 413.7)

Part 414 - Nursing Homes-continuous Violation Penalties (§ 414.1 to 414.23)

Part 415 - Nursing Homes-minimum Standards

Part 416 - Repealed (§ 416.4 to 416.6)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
